section.p: Resurrection costs 200 Shards if you are an initiate, and 800 Shards if not. Once you have arranged for resurrection you need not fear death, as you will be magically restored to life here at the temple. To arrange resurrection, pay the fee and write '' in the Resurrection box on your Adventure Sheet. If you are later killed, turn to 640 in The War-Torn Kingdom.

You can have only one resurrection arranged at any one time. If you arrange another resurrection later at a different temple, the original one is cancelled. Cross it off your Adventure Sheet. You do not get a refund.
